ti:translation.ti:label: Beasts are rational
ti:translation.ti:description: Plutarch. Moralia, Vol. XII. Cherniss, Harold, and Helmbold, William C., translators. Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press. London: William Heinemann Ltd. 1957 (printing)

ti:translation.ti:label: That brute beasts make use of reason
ti:translation.ti:description: Plutarch. Plutarch's Morals, Vol. V. Goodwin, William W., editor; J., A., Sir, translator. Boston: Little, Brown, and Company. Cambridge. 1874.

ti:edition.ti:label: Περὶ τοῦ τὰ ἄλογα λόγῳ χρῆσθαι
ti:edition.ti:description: Plutarch. Plutarchi Chaeronensis Moralia, Vol. VI. Vernardakēs, Grēgorios N., editor. Leipzig: Teubner. 1895.
